sentences.sContent: But “the hostile part can be mobilized from time to time,” by what he calls “anti-immigrant entrepreneurs.
sentences.sContent_eng: But “the hostile part can be mobilized from time to time,” by what he calls “anti-immigrant entrepreneurs.
sentences.sCn: 但是“敌对的那部分可能会不时地动员”，以他称之为“反移民企业家”的名义。

sentences.sContent: That such a woman would want more for her daughter than someone who was a failed boxer, a doorman, and an illegal immigrant seemed to him perfectly reasonable.
sentences.sContent_eng: That such a woman would want more for her daughter than someone who was a failed boxer, a doorman, and an illegal immigrant seemed to him perfectly reasonable.
sentences.sCn: 在他看来，这样一个女人想要给自己的女儿找一个比失败的拳击手、看门人和非法移民更好的男人，是完全合理的。

remMethod.val: im(在…内)+migr(移动)+ant(表人)→向内迁移的人→移民， 侨民

trans.tranOther: someone who enters another country to live there permanently
